title: how to plan it
review: this is for people who travel with no real agenda till they get there , in india a company called " makemytours.com " couldnt have been better honest and accomodating they got me started and they also plan full trips if thats what you wish best of luck i had a trip of a life time and im going back . nigel australia

title: Desert Safari Tour
review: It's a different priceless experience you must do at least once in your lifetime..:)

title: Land of Maharajas
review: I traveled from Delhi to Jaisalmer by the night train arriving in the morning with all the crowds and heat you just have to grin and bear to find a decent place on a tight budget it is like looking for a waterfall in the desert at the same time you must try to visit most of the vibrant cities in Rajasthan,my budget was Rs.10.000 for just over a week.Having found a place cold shower and head for the market place to find out about the camel trips to the desert,I found a guy who looked fairly honest and went back to room where I was staying paid for two days and by mid day I was heading out towards the desert you could see all the little Jain temples with the white marble stones and the city gradually disappearing as we entered the desert we talked as I can speak the language sort of rough and as the light started to fade he found a spot to stay for the night,he lit a fire and cooked some local things which under the circumstances we ate had a laugh and settled down for the night,it was cold but when you live in the UK you can put up with the cold.As dawn approached my guige was awake and he gave me some tea and Indian bread,soon we were heading back to the city which could be seen from th

title: Our Thar-iffic Adventure
review: Desert Thar safari were friendly and went the extra mile to make sure we were looked after. Although we only planned to spend one night in the desert we ended up staying for two nights as nothing beats travelling by camel by day and sleeping under the stars at night! The dunes we visited were deserted and beautiful and our camel wallahs looked after us and their camels well.

title: Amazing safari!
review: Had a fantastic experience with this company. Our guides were very helpful and always trying to make our experience unique. Ridding a camel bear-back was perhaps the highlight. The food was amazing, honestly probably the best chapatis I have had in india, made fresh in the desert by our guide Nepal. I would definitely recommend this company to fellow travelers!

title: Less than expectations
review: We enjoyed the safari however found it slightly less than our high

title: Never miss this
review: If you're planning to Thar Desert then don't miss out this amazing experience and look after doon. This was an amazing experience. During that, we've also done camel riding with some few extra bucks.

title: Desert Safari Tour
review: It's a different priceless experience you must do at least once in your lifetime..:)

title: Average experience
review: This was an average experience , The safari was fine , nothing luxury . The food served was cold and the guide was least interested in showing us things around .
